title: Project Vi Border isn't lined up properly.

replies.body: How are you even getting yours to show up? I have the Project Vi skin, icon, and got the 3 borders/icon and my border doesn't even show up.

For the borders, you'll need to earn PROJECT tokens by completing missions. you can then craft the Three Hunters Borders and final hunt icon. Once you do that, you'll have the three borders added to your inventory. When you go to play PROJECT Vi, Jhin or Vayne, the border should then display. 

Now, if you've done all of this and you still aren't seeing it, please shoot a ticket over to player support, and they can take a look at your account and see what's going on. :)

I know this is off topic, but do you know if the bug where Nunu Bot is missing his lightning arm particles is at least noted? It's one of my favorite parts of the skin, and it's been so long since I've reported it that I'ts starting to feel like it hasn't been noticed yet.

Hey! 

Quick context - it isn't an image over another, one image has a border baked on it, the other image does not. They're named exactly the same sans _LE at the end of the image with the border baked on top of the original load screen splash. *We also tested these, but there can be sizing issues depending on ranked borders and other items on the load screen.*

I believe Riot Time Wizard was [looking into this](https://twitter.com/RiotTimeWizard/status/934598658300960768), but I don't believe a call has been made on what adjustments the team would potentially be making.
